meanings.definition: A plant of the bellflower family, typically with bell-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The campanula in the garden had beautiful blue bell-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent2: I planted a campanula in my backyard to add color to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the campanula as a tiny bell to play pranks on the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the delicate chime of a campanula.
meanings.sent5: The campanula swayed gently in the breeze, its petals resembling tiny bells ringing softly.

meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the bellflower family, commonly known as bellflowers.
meanings.sent1: The campanula genus includes many different types of bellflowers.
meanings.sent2: Gardening enthusiasts often admire the beauty of campanula species in their yards.
meanings.sent3: The campanula plants whispered secrets to each other in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: Her love for campanula blossomed like a field of colorful bellflowers in spring.
meanings.sent5: The delicate campanula blooms added a touch of elegance to the garden.
